com.joliciel.talismane.lexicon

Class LexiconChain

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joliciel.talismane.lexicon.LexiconChain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Lexicon, PosTaggerLexicon, Serializable

    public class LexiconChain
extends Object
implements PosTaggerLexicon
    A chain of lexicons that can be used to pool lexical information.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      For a given word, an ordered set of all postags to be considered in tagging (using the natural ordering for postags).

      Returns all lexical entries in this lexicon, without any guaranteed order.
